text: Ezɨ Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn Duam gavgavim Samson ganɨngizɨma an Askelon nguibar ekiam giraghu. A ghuaghira 30plan gumazibav soghezɨ me ariaghirezɨ, a men biziba ini. Egha men 30plan korotiar aghuiba inigha an akar isɨn zuimɨn mɨngarimɨn gun mɨkemezir darazigh anɨngi. Egha a bizir otozir kam bagha navim bar osemegha, uamategha uan nguibamɨn ghu.
